title.native: 文豪とアルケミスト ～審判ノ歯車～
title.romaji: Bungou to Alchemist: Shinpan no Haguruma

description:
Inside a labyrinthine library exist the souls of the world’s greatest writers. Now, these Alchemists must delve into the stories of old and do whatever is necessary to carry them out to their proper conclusions. Evil beings are hell-bent on destroying these stories, and the authors must believe in each other to stop them. There is only one way for this to end!

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: Literary Greats and Alchemists: The Gears of Judgment

tags.name: Classic Literature
tags.description: Discusses or adapts a work of classic world literature.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

title.native: 文豪とアルケミスト コミックアンソロジー

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_7265687568142)

Freelancer with a desk at [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Nakajima is strongly associated with the animated adaptations of the works of [Rumiko Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/96891/), having worked as an animation director on [Urusei Yatsura](https://anilist.co/anime/1293/), [Maison Ikkoku](https://anilist.co/anime/1453/) and [Ranma ½](https://anilist.co/anime/210/) also also serving as the character designer on latter.

She is married to [Tomohiro Hirata](https://anilist.co/staff/122071/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/dmmolg_com) | [Official Website](http://games.dmm.com/)

Part of DMM. Producer and publisher of online games.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_7265687568142)

Freelancer with a desk at [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Nakajima is strongly associated with the animated adaptations of the works of [Rumiko Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/96891/), having worked as an animation director on [Urusei Yatsura](https://anilist.co/anime/1293/), [Maison Ikkoku](https://anilist.co/anime/1453/) and [Ranma ½](https://anilist.co/anime/210/) also also serving as the character designer on latter.

She is married to [Tomohiro Hirata](https://anilist.co/staff/122071/).

__Height:__ 150 cm

[Fanclub](https://www.gokinjolno.jp/) | [Blog](http://nanjolno.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nanjolno) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nanjolno/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFJORT2GGeNsKKLCf3BqSEQ)

She was the vocalist of the band fripSide and graduated in April 2022 with the fripSide Phase 2 Final Arena Tour. Likes cats, Final Fantasy XIV (even dubbed and sung the battle theme of Suzaku), and ramen.

**Non anime roles:**
- Soltina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Noise - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Topaz - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Shu - Arknights (VG)
- Junah - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Trigger - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

UraShimaSakataSen (浦島坂田船), or USSS for short, is a 4-unit utaites group consisting of [Uratanuki](https://anilist.co/staff/120293) (Green), [Shima](https://anilist.co/staff/147558) (Purple), [Sakata](https://anilist.co/staff/131139/) (Red) and [Senra](https://anilist.co/staff/160870) (Yellow). They've teamed up in 2013 and opened at least one live tour each year. They also have their own commercial items such as some merchandise. Also, they have a close relationship in real life.

In Spring 2017, USSS formed a fictional unit called "Fourpe" (フォープ Fōpu) under contract with NBCUniversal Entertainment Japan. In Fall 2019, the group received a short deformed animated comedy series, Days of Urashimasakatasen (浦島坂田船の日常 Urashimasakatasen no Nichijou).

(Source: Utaite Wiki)
A Japanese video game developer and TV show producer. He is best known for directing the live-action visual novel 428: Shibuya Scramble, which is a prequel to the CANAAN anime.

Michael Tremain Sinterniklaas is a French-American voice actor, ADR director and script writer who has provided voices for a number of English language versions of Japanese anime films and television series, as well as cartoons and video games. He has worked for Studiopolis, Funimation, 4K Media, Central Park Media, Bandai Entertainment, Viz Media and Media Blasters. He is the founder and owner of NYAV Post, a Bi-coastal studio located in New York City and Los Angeles, which dubbed many different anime titles and recorded several original prelay works.

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kojima2019)

Animation Producer. Previously leader of [OLM](https://anilist.co/studio/28/OLM) Team Kojima, currently CEO of [BUG FILMS](https://anilist.co/studio/7348/BUG-FILMS).
